text.0: we will with indra and all gods to aid us bring these existing worlds into subjection.
text.1: our sacrifice our bodies and our offspr let indra form together with Ādityas.
text.2: with the Ādityas with the band of maruts may indra be protector of our bodies.
text.3: as when the gods came after they had slaughtered the asuras keeping safe their godlike nature.
text.4: brought the sun hitherward with mighty powers and looked about them on their vigorous godhead.
